## ViewTemplate.(constructor)

Creates an instance of ViewTemplate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(html: string | HTMLTemplateElement, factories?: Record<string, ViewBehaviorFactory>, policy?: DOMPolicy | undefined);
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

html


</td><td>

string \| HTMLTemplateElement


</td><td>

The html representing what this template will instantiate, including placeholders for directives.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

factories


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, [ViewBehaviorFactory](../fast-element.viewbehaviorfactory/)<!-- -->&gt;


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The directives that will be connected to placeholders in the html.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

policy


</td><td>

[DOMPolicy](../fast-element.dompolicy/) \| undefined


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The security policy to use when compiling this template.
